metadata.title: CVE-2018-11017 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The newVar_N function in decompile.c in libming through 0.4.8 mishandlescases where the header indicates a file size greater than the actual size,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Segmentationfault and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ming package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
